From Shanaya Kapoor, Aryan Khan to Rasha Thadani: 7 star kids who are all set to make their Bollywood debut in 2025 - Hindustan Times
summary:
From Shanaya Kapoor, Aryan Khan to Rasha Thadani: 7 Star Kids Making Their Bollywood Debut in 2025

Date: Jan 10, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

2025 has arrived with a fresh wave of star kids eager to debut in the Hindi film industry. This article explores seven star kids ready to take the leap and examines their backgrounds, debuts, and the films they're associated with this year.

  • Shanaya Kapoor: Set to debut in Aankhon Ki Gustaakhiyan.
  • Ibrahim Ali Khan: Making his debut in Sarzameen.
  • Ahaan Panday: Starring in a young love story directed by Mohit Suri.
  • Rasha Thadani: Debuting in Azaad, releasing on January 17.
  • Aaman Devgan: Also debuting in Azaad.
  • Simar Bhatia: Set to appear in Ikkis.
  • Aryan Khan: Making his debut as a writer and director with the Netflix series Stardom.
“After surfing through the batch of 2025, who do you have the highest expectations from this year?”

This year is poised for exciting new entries in Bollywood, as these star kids step into the limelight, each with their unique backgrounds and flair.
newTitle: Star Kids Making Their Bollywood Debut in 2025

Alia Bhatt's backless swimsuit for Thailand vacation with Ranbir Kapoor and Raha could be yours for Rs… - Hindustan Times
summary:
Alia Bhatt's Stylish Swimsuit for Thailand Vacation

Date: Jan 10, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Alia Bhatt vacationed in Thailand with Ranbir Kapoor and their daughter Raha, sharing beautiful moments from their New Year celebration.

  • Alia wore a backless black swimsuit during her holiday.
  • The swimsuit is from the London-based label Hunza G and costs about ₹18,496.
  • The couple stayed at a luxury resort and shared photos that invoked wanderlust.
  • Alia accessorized her look minimally, highlighting a no-makeup, sunkissed aesthetic.
  • She is set to star in an upcoming film, 'Alpha', to be released on December 25, 2025.
“If you didn’t post a beach photo, did you even go on vacation?” - Alia Bhatt

The event highlights Alia's trendy vacation style and increases public interest in beach fashion.
newTitle: Alia Bhatt's Stylish Swimsuit for Thailand Vacation

P Jayachandran, eminent playback singer known as Bhava Gayakan, dies at 80 after long illness - Hindustan Times
summary:
P Jayachandran, Eminent Playback Singer Known as Bhava Gayakan, Dies at 80

Date: Thursday, Source: Hindustan Times

Renowned playback singer P Jayachandran, affectionately called Bhava Gayakan, passed away on Thursday evening in Kerala while undergoing treatment. He was known for his soulful renditions and had a prolific career in Indian music.

  • P Jayachandran died at a private medical college after collapsing at home.
  • He recorded over 16,000 songs across various languages including Malayalam, Tamil, and Hindi.
  • He received several prestigious awards including the National Film Award and multiple Kerala State Film Awards.
  • His contributions to music were recognized across generations, with significant collaborations with renowned composers.
  • He is survived by his wife, daughter, and son.
Kerala Governor said, "his endearing voice that charmed audience for six decades will go on to soothe people's hearts."

The passing of P Jayachandran marks a significant loss for the music industry and the countless fans who cherished his work.
newTitle: P Jayachandran, Eminent Playback Singer Known as Bhava Gayakan, Dies at 80

Game Changer advance box office collection 1st Day: Ram Charan starrer earns Rs 3.73 crore from Hindi shows; eyes Rs 50 crore all-India debut - TOI Etimes
summary:
Game Changer advance box office collection 1st Day: Ram Charan starrer earns Rs 3.73 crore from Hindi shows; eyes Rs 50 crore all-India debut

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The much-anticipated film 'Game Changer' starring Ram Charan has made a solid debut at the box office, earning Rs 3.73 crores from Hindi shows on its first day, with expectations of an all-India collection reaching Rs 50 crore.

  • The film was released on the first day of October 2023.
  • Ram Charan's performance has been praised, contributing to the film's success.
  • Box office analysts are optimistic about the film's collection over the next few days.
“The film is set for a remarkable first weekend, with strong word of mouth expected to drive audience attendance.”

This strong opening day sets a promising trajectory for the film's performance in the coming weeks.
newTitle: Game Changer Has a Strong Opening Day at the Box Office
